content.rendered:
FIS Solution

FIS Solutions is a no-code SaaS loan management system empowering lenders and businesses in different sectors to unlock their full potential. For lenders: scale your businesses without the hassle of IT management. For non-finance industries: integrate fintech products into your customer journey

About

Brand: FIS Solution

Location: Riga, Latvia

Industry: Fintech

Budget:: up to $10,000

Clutch Review: 

5.0
 5/5

Product link: ingain.com

Type of software: Web App

Scope of work: Front-end, Back-end, Project Management

FIS Solutions needed to create a form builder in PHP and implemented a JavaScript widget (script) that loads forms in any third-party (partner) website, and integrate it into the system.

Technologies

PHP

JAVA script

mobgo DB

What our client
wanted

Armands Liseks

Chief Executive Officer & Co-Founder at InGain

We needed to create a form builder in PHP and implemented a JavaScript widget that loads forms in any third-party website

Challenge

  • The main challenge was to create the required functionality in a limited period of time, which would be fully integrated with the system

Key features

  • Created form builder - form elements are configurable through the backend. There is the possibility to create/edit form elements order, type, field-name, title, default value, read-only, hidden, step, requirement/optional, and basic validation.
  • We provide a simple way to customize form design and change the color scheme and size.
  • Backend logic is implemented using PHP 8.1 without framework usage.
  • Code is modular, easily scalable, and adaptable for any PHP framework or MVC platform with existing API functionality.
  • Third-party (partner) can integrate widgets with minimal programming logic.

Project Team

Anna

Project Manager​

Artem

Full-stack developer

Client’s review

Armands Liseks

Chief Executive Officer & Co-Founder at InGain

They did a really good job

5.0
 5/5

Business Value

Form builder provides a simple way to customize form design and change the color scheme and size.

This supplemented the system with the necessary functionality, which greatly improved the customer experience.

Let's start. It's easier than you think.

Contact us
Next case

excerpt.rendered: FIS Solution revolutionizes loan management with our cutting-edge no-code SaaS solution, empowering lenders and businesses across diverse sectors. Maximize efficiency with streamlined processes, advanced analytics, and seamless automation, unlocking your full potential effortlessly.
